name: Bonkers Bolts
description:
Defend your dwelling against livid lightning!

Can you survive 60 seconds against a savage storm? Place force fields in the way of lightning bolts to protect your home until the storm clears. Yellow circles show you where lightning is about to strike. You gain a force field when you successfully block a bolt.

CONTROLS

  • Left Click - Place force field
  • Up & Down Arrow Keys - Change volume
  • R - Reset volume

Bonkers Bolts was made in 3 hours for the TriJam game jam #63.
Theme: "Weather the Storm".
Any feedback is appreciated in the comments.
Thanks for playing!
